definition: Hezhou prefecture-level city in Guangxi
surname He
to congratulate
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
Hezhou prefecture-level city in Guangxi

sentences.english: Ethnic groups in Hezhou interact each other frequently and complexly.
sentences.chinese: 賀州族羣間的互動是頻繁而又複雜多樣的。

sentences.english: Where eight steps of Guangxi He Zhou City area has ceiling material sell?
sentences.chinese: 廣西賀州市八步區哪裏有天花板材料賣？

sentences.english: Today very pleased to have this opportunity to visit together with you the beautiful HeZhou.
sentences.chinese: 今天非常高興有機會與各位一起遊覽美麗的賀州。

sentences.english: The modern service industry in Hezhou is developing vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 賀州現代服務業蓬勃發展。

sentences.english: Speeding up industrialization is of great significance in invigorating the economy of Hezhou prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 加快工業化進程對於振興賀州地區經濟。

sentences.english: Stone industry is one of the main characteristic pillar industries of Hezhou.
sentences.chinese: 石材產業是賀州主要特色支柱產業之一。

sentences.english: Hezhou is the base of green agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 賀州是綠色農產品生產基地。

sentences.english: Hezhou has a favorable industrial development foundation.
sentences.chinese: 賀州有良好的產業發展基礎。

sentences.english: Purple cloud wonderland lies in the Limu Village Etang Town Hezhou City.
sentences.chinese: 紫雲景區位於廣西賀州市八步區鵝塘鎮慄木村。
